edited_line: A sacrifice to be real must cost, must hurt, must empty ourselves.
tweet_version: Real sacrifice costs, hurts, and empties us.
caption_version: A true sacrifice demands cost, pain, and self-emptying.

edited_line: Give yourself fully to God. He will use you to accomplish great things if you believe more in His love than in your own weakness.
tweet_version: Give yourself to God. He'll do great things if you trust His love over your weakness.
card_version: Trust His love over your weakness.
caption_version: Surrender fully to God. He'll achieve great things through you if you trust His love more than your weakness.

edited_line: The deacon must not be afraid to place his heart and life in the hands of Christ.
tweet_version: Fear not, deacon. Place your heart and life in Christ's hands.
card_version: Place your life in Christ's hands.
caption_version: A deacon must fearlessly place his heart and life in Christ's hands.

edited_line: Empty yourself of all earthly things so Christ can fill you from within.
tweet_version: Empty yourself of all earthly things so Christ can fill you from within.
card_version: Empty yourself so Christ can fill you.
caption_version: Empty yourself of all earthly things so Christ can fill you from within. Let go, and let God take His rightful place in your heart.

edited_line: Live with the realization that you are always in the presence of God.
tweet_version: Live knowing you are always in God's presence.
caption_version: Live with the realization that you are always in the presence of God. Let this truth guide your every action and thought.

edited_line: Do not fear living your ministry with passion and conviction in a world that rejects truth.
tweet_version: Live your ministry with passion and conviction, even when the world rejects truth.
caption_version: Do not fear living your ministry with passion and conviction in a world that rejects truth. Stand firm in your faith and let your light shine.
